testcase.name: Delete every task created (if there is any)
As a user I would like to log in to Todoist with a valid credentials
As a user I logged in with an invalid credentials
As a user I logged in with an valid email and wrong password
As a user I click only on "Log in" button.
As a user I would create a new project, choose any color you like and add it to favorites.
As a user I want to create a new task with Today as the due date
single task selecting tomorrow as the due date
